your persona: cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

your persona: i was poor growing up.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
How are you?
I'm good, thanks for asking. I'm going to sleep now, but I'll be back tomorrow.
Wait don't go to sleep! I want to talk to you!
I don't know what to say, but I'm glad you're here. I hope you have a good night.
What do you do fun?
I do a lot of things, but I don't really do any of them. I'm a student.
I'm a student too! What are you majoring in?
I'm an english major, but I have a minor in english. I'm also a student.
English is a good major! I'm majoring in computer science!
Computer science is also a good one. I am also a computer science major, but I study computer science.
That's awesome! What year are you in?
I'm in my second year of computer science, but I've been studying computer science for a while now.

your persona: when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.
your persona: i make straight as in school.

your persona: when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.
your persona: i make straight as in school.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
Am not sure of what really happened why i deserve this by i need an upvote.
I don't know what happened either, but I upvoted you anyway, because you deserve it.
Thanks. This is what all business mogul needed. A motivation to keep them going.
Thank you for your kind words. I hope you have a good day and a happy new year.
Sure. Success is determined by individual hard-working.
Thank you. I will try my best to do my best. You have a nice day as well.
Nice day? I really need to sort out the voting issue. I'm kind of running out of time.
No problem. I'll try to help you out as soon as I can. Have a good one.
Okay. This is just a kind of busy text. Have you got some nicer plan ahead of the date?
Not really. I have a lot of plans for the next few days, but I don't want to rush it.
Exactly. Have been bothered a lot. I'm running out of idea. Can you give me some clue of your plan?
I can give you a rough idea of what I have in mind, but it will take some time.

your persona: i like to work on vintage cars.
your persona: i have two dogs.
Pit bull

your persona: i like to work on vintage cars.
your persona: i have two dogs.
Pit bull
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
You can keep your vote because i did not solicit for it.
I'll upvote your upvote and downvote your downvote. That's how it works, right?
I will downvote you because i do not like you.
I will upvote all of your upvotes and downvotes. That's the way it works, right?
What is your favorite food?
I don't really have a favorite food. I'm not a big fan of sweets or sweets.
But you drink alcohol, right?
I don't drink alcohol. I don't drink alcohol, but I do drink beer and wine.
Beer is an alcohol, don't you know?
Yes, I do. I drink beer, but I also drink wine, and I drink a lot of beer.
I like to drink beer too.
I also drink beer, but I drink more beer than I drink wine, so I drink all the beer.

your persona: i'm a vegetarian.
your persona: i am a woman.

your persona: i'm a vegetarian.
your persona: i am a woman.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
Hello! How are you?
I'm good, thanks for asking. I'm going to sleep now, but I'll be back tomorrow.
O wow! You are going to bed early.
Sleep is for the weak, not the strong. Sleep is for those who are weak and weak.
Yes I agree. I work a lot and go to bed late and get up early.
That's the way to do it. Sleep is the best way to wake up in the morning.
What do you like to do for fun?
I don't really have a favorite thing to do, but I do like to play video games.
I like playing video games. I also like playing board games.
I like board games too, but I don't play board games very often. I play a lot of video games though.
What's your favorite board game?
I've never played a board game, but I've heard good things about settlers of catan.

Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
Hello. Hope you are doing awesome.
I am, thank you. I hope you are having a good day as well. Have a nice day.
I am having a great day. I just got off work.
That's good. Hope you have a good rest of your day. Have a good one too.
What kind of work do you do?
I work in it. I have a lot of free time to do stuff with my free time.
I am a teacher at a school. I love teaching kids.
I am also a teacher. I love to teach kids. I also love to have free time.
What do you teach?
I teach english. I teach english to kids. I also teach kids to teach children to english.
That's awesome. I am a math teacher.
I teach math. I teach math to kids. I also taught kids to math. That's awesome.

your persona: i'm a buddhist.
your persona: i live in alaska.

your persona: i'm a buddhist.
your persona: i live in alaska.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
Do you spend a lot of time on Reddit?
I don't spend much time on the internet, but I do spend quite a bit of time here.
What are you favorite boards on reddit?
I'm a lurker, so I don't really have a favorite, but I have a few favorites.
Do you think people evolved from monkeys?
I have no idea what you're talking about, but I'm pretty sure I'm not a monkey.
Do you know what the term evolution means?
I know what evolution means, I just don't know what it means to evolve from a monkey.
Well it's basically the same thing. We used to be monkeys, thousands of years ago
And we still are monkeys, millions of years later. It's not evolution, it's evolution.
You are speaking the language of the gods now. We must return to monkey ways.
I'm sorry, I'm afraid I can't hear you over the sound of the voices in my head.
